article: My wife called,"will you come here and make your darling daughter eat her food ?I rushed to the scene. My only daughter,Sindu , _ frightened. In front of her was a bowl filled with rice. She _ disliked rice . "Sindu ,why don't you take a few _ of this ? Just for Dad 'sake . If don't ,your mom will shout at me ."Sindu softened a bit and _ her tears with the back of her hands."OK,Dad.I will eat .But you should ......"Sindu hesitated."Dad ,if I eat the rice ,will you give _ I ask for ?""Oh,sure ."She _ eating the whole quantity . After the ordeal was through ,Sindu came to me ,"Dad ,I want to have my _ shaved off this Sunday ! "Darling ,we will be sad _ you with a clean-shaved head .""Dad ,you saw how difficult it was to eat the rice ."Sindu was in tears." _ you promised to give me whatever I ask for." It was _ for me to call the shots ."Our promise must be _ ." With her head clean-shaven ,Sindu had a round face .On Monday morning , I dropped her at her _ .Just then , a boy shouted ,Sindu please wait for me ! _ struck me was the hairless head of that boy . "Sir , your daughter Sindu is great indeed ."a lady said to me ,"That boy who is walking along with your daughter is my son Harish .He is _ from leukemia . He lost all his hair due to the side _ of the chemotherapy .He refused to come back to school for fear of being laughed at . Sindu visited him last week , and promised him that she will take care of the teasing issue. But , I _ imagined she would sacrifice her lovely hair for the sake of my son " . "My little angel , you are teaching me _ selfless real love is !" I wept.
